bibl.title: Territory of Washington vs. George Smith
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: District Court for the Fourth Judicial District of Washington Territory

body.p: Hundred dollards each that they will be and appear as witnesses in said court. And it is further adjudged that they stand committed until they so recognize. And that the costs in this case be taxed to the Territory of Washington as follows. Justice fees $7.45 Constable 6.60 Witness 6.60 Total $20.65 This 2nd day of June A.D. 1888 J.R. Snyder Justice of the Peace
June 2nd, 1888. Charles D. Colwell C.M. Graves and F.L. Graves recognize as required. Bonds filed and approved and are discharged
The said George Smith neglecting to recognize as required is committed to the County Jail. Commitment issued and delivered to J.F. Warren. Chief of Police for service

Territory of Washington County of Spokane J.R. Snyder being duly sworn, deposes and says that he is a Justice of the Peace that the above and foregoing account is just, true and correct, and the services therein charged were actually and necessarily performed J.R. Snyder Subscribed and sworn to before me this 4th day of June 1888 P.O. Wickel Notary public

Territory of Washington County of Spokane J.F. Warren being duly sworn, deposes and says that he is Chief of Police that the above and foregoing account is just, true and correct, and the services therein charged were actually and necessarily performed. J.F. Warren Subscribed and sworn to before me this 4th day of June 1888 J.R. Snyder
Office Fees J.F. Warren June 2, 1888 Serving Warrant 1.00 2 miles .20c $1.20 " " " Attending Court 3.00 " " " Commiting to jail 1.00 " " " Serving subpoena 2 miles .20c 1.40 Total $6.60
Witness Fees " " " Charles D. Colwell 1 day 2.00 2 miles .20 $2.20 " " " C.M. Graves 1 day 2.00 2 miles .20 $2.20 " " " F.L. Graves 1 day 2.00 2 miles .20 $2.20 Total $6.60

Transcript of Costs as Per Fee Book Page 426 and 428 Costs taxed to Plaintiff Justice fees June 2 1888 Docketing case $0.25 " " " Filing complaint affidavit .25 .40 " " " Issuing warrant 1.00 Filing .15 addifavit .25 .40 " " " Entering Appearance .25 " " " Continuance .50 " " " Issuing Subpoena .20 Filing 2 addresses .15 .60 " " " Swearing 4 wtinesses .60 " " " Entering Judgment .50 Taxing .50 costs 1.00 " " " Taking 3 Witness Bonds .50 each 1.50 " " " Filing 3 Bonds .45 " " " Issuing Commitment .50 Accured Costs Making Transcripts + folios 20c. each 2.00 Certificate 1.00 Total $10.45

Territory of Washington County of Spokane J.J.R. Snyder, a Justice of the Peace in and for said County, do hereby certify that the foregoing transcript and the original process and document attached, and made a part of this transcript, contains a full and perfect statement of all the proceedings before me in said cause. In witness whereof I have set my hand this 4th day of June 1888. J.R. Snyder Justice of the Peace
